response.original_title: A Woman From The Past, Much Loved
response.overview: 16mm black & white film frames from the distant past fondly remembered and seen in low magnification through a microscope connected to the computer. It has great appeal for anyone who shares in an almost fetishistic love for film stock â€“ in fact it may be the film, rather than the woman, who is the much loved.
